title: How do I close background applications?
answer:
Go to the **Settings** screen, and touch **Manage apps**. Under **Running**, select the application you want to close, touch **Stop**, and follow the onscreen instructions to close the application. 
 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430145112650001.gif)    ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430145119562001.gif)    ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430145127473001.gif)   

Note: The figures are for your reference only. Actual screens may vary slightly.
